messages.message: @jack.robbins how is EPD-4574 similar to this issue?

actually this seems to be a backend error

the frontend is comparing the result of `/api/v2/documents/review/count` with the number of docs already fetched (see line (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/6d104ab/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/pages/Workspaces/review/ReviewTable/hooks/useInfiniteScrollingReviewDocuments.ts#L62)) to set `hasNextPage`
-> if `hasNextPage` is true, the frontend will keep calling fetchNextPage (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/6d104ab/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/pages/Workspaces/review/ReviewTable/hooks/useInfiniteScrollingReviewDocuments.ts#L64), which will keep calling `/api/v2/documents/review/list`

the problem is that for some reason, `/api/v2/documents/review/count` returns 2, even though there are no docs in the escalation queue (see screenshots of requests in UAT workspace (https://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com/workspaces/review/documents?workspace=hoangpaul-workspace))
@Serena both involved human review and showed 'Error occurred executing GRPC method' messages

oh i see what you're saying, i don't think the `'Error occurred executing GRPC method'` message here is relevant

so i think they're separate issues
